page.title: 10SCHOOLING IN ATWORTH
page.content: The Parish Church of St Michaels together with the nearbye Non_Conformist Chapel are village centres and have good congregations. The Atworth Primary and Junior school is still a going concern with children travelling in from outside to attend,such is the reputation.For secondary education the children from the east end of the village travel to The George Ward school in Melksham while those living to the west attend St Laurences in Bradford_upon_Avon.A few go to Bath to St Marks. The Stonar Sshool, a girls private day and boarding school is housed at Cotles, one of the old Manor Houses to the south of the church.The school makes little impact on village life.
